<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Whispering Way Scion](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=72)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Eye of Dread

</column>

Your  family  has  long  been associated with the enigmatic death cult known as the Whispering Way, which was recently responsible for the terrible devastation in the nation of Lastwall. Whether or not you have followed in their footsteps, you know many of the philosophy’s secrets.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) skill, and the [Undead Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Student of the Canon](/Feats.aspx?ID=847) skill feat.
name: Whispering Way Scion
